price: 225. Miyaadan arag inay tog kasta la wareegaan waxa ay ku wareersan yihiin (iyagoo ku ammaanaya dad run iyo beenba)?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي كُلِّ وَادٖ يَهِيمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: alam tara annahum fī kulli wādin yahīmūna
